traits.Illumination: As a bonus action, the cranium rat can shed dim light from its brain in a 5-foot radius or extinguish the light.
traits.Telepathic Shroud: The cranium rat is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as to all divination spells.

actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.
